memagin minisage paudgalika ha samuhika jiwana aramunu pulul karawanu labe.minisage gruhastha hasirim, pruthagjana pawathum menma deshapalanika, aarthika, adhikarana, adhyapanika ha samajayiya katayuthuwaladi pilipadiya yuthu sadacharathmaka winaya dharmayan islamaye melesa wigraha kara thibe.islamiya sadacharayen minis jiwithaya, niwasath samajaya dakwath kama mesaye sita yuda pitiya ha sama sammelana dakwath ketiyenma kiwahoth thotille sita sohon bima dakwa sakaswiya yuthu aakaraya iganwe.islamiya sadacharaya thulin kisidu anshuwak gilihi natha.
